results.text: So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
results.reason: This verse assures us of God's presence and support, which can be comforting in times of loneliness.
results.reflection: Even in loneliness, God's steadfast presence offers strength and support.

results.text: Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid or terrified because of them, for the Lord your God goes with you; he will never leave you nor forsake you.
results.reason: This verse emphasizes that God is always with us, providing courage and companionship.
results.reflection: God's unwavering presence dispels the fear of being alone.

results.text: Even though I walk through the darkest valley, I will fear no evil, for you are with me; your rod and your staff, they comfort me.
results.reason: In moments of loneliness, this verse reminds us that God's presence is a source of comfort and protection.
results.reflection: God's presence illuminates the darkest paths, bringing comfort.

results.text: And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.
results.reason: Jesus promises to be with us always, which can be particularly reassuring when feeling isolated.
results.reflection: Christ's eternal presence is a remedy for loneliness.

results.text: God sets the lonely in families, he leads out the prisoners with singing; but the rebellious live in a sun-scorched land.
results.reason: This verse highlights God's provision of community and belonging for the lonely.
results.reflection: God places us in communities, ensuring we are never truly alone.
